about_the_game:
What kind of work is this?
This is an adventure game with a first person perspective.
Qiyun is a device that allows users to enter the spiritual world of others
So as to awaken the memory system of the amnesiac
The World of Qiyun "tells the story of the protagonist being invited as an experimenter to participate in the optimization iteration of the Qiyun system
The protagonist enters the memory world numbered 127 through 'Qiyun'
A series of interesting adventures occur in the process of attempting to awaken 127 memories by entering the spiritual world to find clues.

About game pricing?
Due to the fact that the game was independently created by myself, there are many incomplete sound material blueprints. We also welcome colleagues to provide more references.
This game is permanently free

Guo Suixin's work, thank you for reading my story

name: 启云的世界Qiyun's World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Dual Core 1.8 GHz or AMD Velociraptor 64 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Recommended GTX 1050 Ti or equivalent NVIDIA graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectXcompatible
  • VR Support: no need
